channel.title: Comments on: Worst Player Name of the Week

item.title: By: Kontract
item.dc:creator: Kontract
item.description: My 9 year old son has quite a few that would make you cringe - I thank the lord he has run out of slots on my main server and is making these ridiculous characters on other people's servers now - I sometimes take a look at his screen and feel faint.
item.content:encoded: My 9 year old son has quite a few that would make you cringe – I thank the lord he has run out of slots on my main server and is making these ridiculous characters on other people’s servers now – I sometimes take a look at his screen and feel faint.

item.title: By: jesp3r
item.dc:creator: jesp3r
item.description: worst name ever seen by me in a mmorpg is Hordwarior (with retardeous spelling). This was in WoW, btw.
item.content:encoded: worst name ever seen by me in a mmorpg is Hordwarior (with retardeous spelling). This was in WoW, btw.

item.title: By: nordee
item.dc:creator: nordee
item.description:
Best source of names to annoy people like you: "Bored of the Rings" by the Harvard Lampoon. (Examples: Frito and Dildo Bugger, Tom Benzadrine) It's quite a funny book in it's own right, and a brilliant parody of the Trilogy.
My first WoW nelf hunter was (and still is) "Legolamb".
item.content:encoded:
Best source of names to annoy people like you: “Bored of the Rings” by the Harvard Lampoon. (Examples: Frito and Dildo Bugger, Tom Benzadrine) It’s quite a funny book in it’s own right, and a brilliant parody of the Trilogy.

My first WoW nelf hunter was (and still is) “Legolamb”.

item.title: By: Wrolf
item.dc:creator: Wrolf
item.description: Not even close. The worst name by far is from someone that does not even know what game it is playing. I am talking about the name "Prretygirl". I am sure that it was playing virtual barbie just moments before. The name is so bad that I can't even hazard a guess at the gender of the person playing, so it will be known as it. It has created the worst name ever.
item.content:encoded: Not even close. The worst name by far is from someone that does not even know what game it is playing. I am talking about the name “Prretygirl”. I am sure that it was playing virtual barbie just moments before. The name is so bad that I can’t even hazard a guess at the gender of the person playing, so it will be known as it. It has created the worst name ever.

item.title: By: deltatango
item.dc:creator: deltatango
item.description:
It was always the easiest part for me to make up any unique character name that fits into the lore. and LOTRO in particular gives some nice tips how race-specific names are being built. And for the creativity impaired, there's plenty of name generators throughout the intarweb. Like this: http://www.chriswetherell.com/elf/ or that: http://www.chriswetherell.com/hobbit/ or one might just google for " name generator".
Everytime I see a "Legollass" or "Paladin658" it fills me with utter disgust for those poor creatures that choose to expose themselves to the world bearing such pitiful names.
And no, I won't reveal my favourite in-game names as you will most likely steal it :)
item.content:encoded:
It was always the easiest part for me to make up any unique character name that fits into the lore. and LOTRO in particular gives some nice tips how race-specific names are being built.
And for the creativity impaired, there’s plenty of name generators throughout the intarweb. Like this: http://www.chriswetherell.com/elf/ or that: http://www.chriswetherell.com/hobbit/ or one might just google for ” name generator”.

Everytime I see a “Legollass” or “Paladin658” it fills me with utter disgust for those poor creatures that choose to expose themselves to the world bearing such pitiful names.

And no, I won’t reveal my favourite in-game names as you will most likely steal it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
Bah. When I first knew my bf his nick was Legolas. This however, was way WAY before all the LOTR hype, back in the days of actually reading the books etc. Dare I say it... back when it was cool? :s
I always fancied Duplolas as a take on it, but now, that would be torn apart like any other -olas like you said.
item.content:encoded:
Bah.
When I first knew my bf his nick was Legolas. This however, was way WAY before all the LOTR hype, back in the days of actually reading the books etc. Dare I say it… back when it was cool? :s

I always fancied Duplolas as a take on it, but now, that would be torn apart like any other -olas like you said.
